attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 5 Days at school is too much, we should have a 3day weekend to help us recover. On mondays everyone is asleep  because of the short weekend. And by friday everyone is too tired. Teachers should ome in on mondays and prepare work as they get paid so are more motivated.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
